Package ch.iserver.ace.net.protocol.filter

The package ch.iserver.ace.net.protocol.filter contains request filters.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RequestFilter RequestFilter defines the interface for each request filter implementation.
 

Class Summary
AbstractRequestFilter This is the abstract base class for all RequestFilter.
ConcealDocumentPrepareFilter Request prepare filter for a 'conceal document' message.
ConcealDocumentReceiveFilter Request receive filter for a 'conceal document' message.
DocumentDetailsChangedPrepareFilter Request prepare filter for a 'document details changed' message.
DocumentDetailsChangedReceiveFilter Request receive filter for a 'document details changed' message.
FailureFilter Catches all requests which could not be filtered.
InvitationRejectedRecipientFilter Request recipient filter for a 'invitation rejected' message.
InvitationRejectedSenderFilter Request sender filter for a 'invitation rejected' message.
InviteRequestRecipientFilter Request recipient filter for an 'invite user' message.
InviteRequestSenderFilter Request sender filter for a 'invite user' message.
JoinRejectedRecipientFilter Request recipient filter for a 'join rejected' message.
JoinRejectedSenderFilter Request sender filter for a 'join rejected' message.
JoinRequestRecipientFilter Request recipient filter for a 'invitation rejected' message.
JoinRequestSenderFilter Request sender filter for a 'join document' message.
JoinRequestSenderFilter.JoinNetworkCallbackWrapper Helper class to wrap an instance of JoinNetworkCallback.
LogFilter Logging filter.
NullRequestFilter NullRequestFilter.
PublishDocumentPrepareFilter Request preapre filter for a 'publish document' message.
PublishDocumentReceiveFilter Request receive filter for a 'publish document' message.
RequestFilterFactory RequestFilter chain Factory to create the client and server request filter chains.
SendDocumentsPrepareFilter Request prepare filter for a 'send documents' message.
SendDocumentsReceiveFilter Request receive filter for a 'send documents' message.
ShutdownFilter Request sender filter for a 'shutdown' request.
UserDiscardedRecipientFilter Request recipient filter for a 'user discarded' message.
 

Package ch.iserver.ace.net.protocol.filter Description

The package ch.iserver.ace.net.protocol.filter contains request filters. These filters build the request filter chains for outgoing and incoming requests and messages, respectively. The request filter chains are constructed according to the protocol definition of ACE.
